survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the company's Learning & Development (L&D) programs, identifying strengths and areas for improvement to enhance professional growth opportunities.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current Learning & Development programs offered by your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current Learning & Development programs offered by your company?

questions.question_text: Which types of L&D programs have you participated in over the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select to capture overlapping participation. Include an optional 'Other' field if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes). Add 'Other' as an open-text option if selected.

script.question_text: Which types of L&D programs have you participated in over the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you utilize the L&D programs provided by your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale. Clarify if 'Never' is selected in Q2, this may require validation.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Add skip logic if 'None' is selected in Q2.

script.question_text: How often do you utilize the L&D programs provided by your company?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in L&D programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time due to workload
Programs not relevant to my role
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Never' in Q3 or 'None' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question targeting non-participants. Include an optional 'Other' field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes). Display only if Q3 = 'Never' or Q2 includes 'None'.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating in L&D programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time due to workload
Programs not relevant to my role
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Never' in Q3 or 'None' in Q2

questions.question_text: How impactful have the L&D programs been for your professional growth?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who did not select 'None' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale. Ensure 'Not applicable' is clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Skip if Q2 includes 'None'.

script.question_text: How impactful have the L&D programs been for your professional growth?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who did not select 'None' in Q2

questions.question_text: What additional L&D topics would you like to see offered?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture unmet needs. Limit response to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What additional L&D topics would you like to see offered?

questions.question_text: Do you feel the L&D programs align with your career goals?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who did not select 'None' in Q2
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure alignment perception.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Skip if Q2 includes 'None'.

script.question_text: Do you feel the L&D programs align with your career goals?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who did not select 'None' in Q2

questions.question_text: How easy is it to access L&D program information and registration?
questions.client_notes: 5-point scale to assess accessibility. Include an optional comment field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Add optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How easy is it to access L&D program information and registration?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the company’s L&D programs to colleagues?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who did not select 'None' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) variant. Use single-choice for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Skip if Q2 includes 'None'.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the company’s L&D programs to colleagues?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who did not select 'None' in Q2

questions.question_text: What is your preferred format for L&D programs? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice to identify delivery preferences. Max 3 selections allowed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes). Add validation for max selections.

script.question_text: What is your preferred format for L&D programs? (Select all that apply)
